requirements.summary: Remove duplicate display of party names in the user interface where the same party name appears multiple times in a single view or component
acceptanceCriteria: Party names are displayed only once per logical grouping in all UI components
No visual duplication of party names occurs in lists, cards, or detail views
The change maintains clarity and does not reduce necessary information

file_operations.description: Review and eliminate duplicate party name displays in the today's notifications table. Ensure each party is shown once per row with consolidated information, removing any redundant party name labels or headers within individual notification items.

Remove duplicate party name displays in the upcoming payments calendar view. Ensure party names appear only once per party entry when displaying parties with payments due on the selected date, consolidating any redundant text or labels.

Review the recent visits section and today's summary statistics for duplicate party name displays. Ensure party names are shown once per visit entry in the recent visits list, removing any redundant party identifiers or labels that may appear alongside the primary party name display.

Remove duplicate party name context from the payment history component when displayed on party detail pages. Since the party context is already established by the parent page, eliminate redundant party name displays within individual payment record entries.
